activities: This certification applies to Aimia Proprietary Loyalty U.S. Inc. ("Aimia"), and specifically excludes any wholly-owned U.S. subsidiary that maintains a separate, current, and applicable Safe Harbor certification. Aimia is a provider of Business to Business services for its clients.  Aimia receives personal data from and about individuals for purposes of fulfilling data processing services at the request of and in accordance and direction of its clients.  Aimia utilizes the data it receives to provide client incentive programs, performance improvement, loyalty marketing, travel, and related travel accommodation fulfillment, market research, and other goods or services to its clients.  In addition, Aimia may use personal data in order to properly manage the employment or contractor relationship with the individual that is the subject of such data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: Third Party - Secure Digital Solutions LLC
personaldata: On-Line, Off Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
recoursemech: Through its Watchdog program, TRUSTe provides alternative dispute resolution for privacy-related disputes.  If, after notifying and working with Aimia about concerns or issues with its privacy practices related to Safe Harbor, individuals not satisfied may contact TRUSTe to express any concerns regarding AIMIA’s privacy practices related to Safe Harbor: https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request
